name: Ctrl + Alter + Defeat
description:
In the distant future, you're one of the best hackers around. Fortunately, you're one of the good guys. Instead of using your skills for evil, you're using all the tools at your disposal to take down the evil HedgeFund Corporation.

Make your way through HedgeFund's headquarters using your hacking skills to take over the minds of the guards who stand in your way. But think carefully. CTRL is a limited resource, and if you don't use it wisely, you may run out and find yourself backed into a dangerous corner. (You'll run "Out of Ctrl", get it??????)

Also, you're a raccoon.

BUGS:

- Sometimes when scanning, you can select spaces where there aren't any enemies, but doing this can cause a crash. Just focus on the enemies you can see

- It's possible to cheese one of the guards on level 5 (but you'll miss out on one of my favorite statuses)

- Sometimes restarting the level doesn't work if the ui is in a weird state (try hitting shift if this happens)

- The tops of ladders can be a little sticky. Just wiggle around a bit and you'll get through
